meanings.sent1: After dinner, I wanted to retaste the delicious dessert.
meanings.sent2: I retaste the soup to see if it needs more seasoning.
meanings.sent3: I retaste the spicy sauce and it still made me pucker my lips.
meanings.sent4: Retasting the childhood treat brought back sweet memories.
meanings.sent5: She retasted the exotic fruit, savoring every flavor note.

meanings.definition: To experience the taste of something again.
meanings.sent1: The chef encouraged us to retaste the dish to fully appreciate the flavors.
meanings.sent2: I retaste the coffee to see if it tastes better with sugar.
meanings.sent3: He retasted the sour candy and made a funny face.
meanings.sent4: Retasting the victory, she felt the same rush of excitement.
meanings.sent5: Retasting the homemade pie, she was transported back to her grandmother's kitchen.
